description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.
This set contains the following:

Playable Aircraft: F-16XL
A prototype bomber based on the F-16. With cranked-arrow wings, it boasts greater mobility and more weaponry than the original. Its excellent maneuverability at low speeds makes it a formidable force against ground targets.
Its mobility retained from the original model also allows it to perform well in close-range combat.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special Wizard Skin.

This aircraft can equip the UGB, 4AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-16XL Set
